content.json: >**NOTE:** This workbook depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Corelight**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-Corelight-parser) which is deployed with the Azure Sentinel Solution.

content.title: Sensor Events Timechart
Sensor Events Count

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "conn"
| where isnotempty(Service)
| summarize count() by Service | take 10
content.title: Top Services

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "conn"
| where isnotempty(DstPort)
| extend dstprt = tostring(DstPort)
| summarize Count=count() by dstprt | sort by Count desc |take 10
content.title: Top Responder Ports

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "conn"
| extend NetworkDirection = case(LocalOrig == true,"outbound", LocalOrig == false, "inbound",'')
| where NetworkDirection == "outbound"
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr) and isnotempty(DstIpAddr) and isnotempty(SrcIpBytes) and isnotempty(DstIpBytes)
| extend bytes = toint(SrcIpBytes) + toint(DstIpBytes)
| summarize Bytes=sum(bytes) by SrcIpAddr, DstIpAddr, NetworkProtocol | sort by Bytes desc | take 15
content.title: Top Outbound Data Flows by Originator Bytes

items.name: Top Outbound Data Flows by Originator Bytes

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "conn"
| extend NetworkDirection = case(LocalOrig == true,"outbound", LocalOrig == false, "inbound",'')
| where NetworkDirection == "inbound"
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr) and isnotempty(DstIpAddr) and isnotempty(SrcIpBytes) and isnotempty(DstIpBytes)
| extend bytes = toint(SrcIpBytes) + toint(DstIpBytes)
| summarize Bytes=sum(bytes) by SrcIpAddr, DstIpAddr, NetworkProtocol | sort by Bytes desc | take 15
content.title: Top Inbound Data Flows by Originator Bytes

items.name: Top Inbound Data Flows by Originator Bytes - Copy

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "conn"
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange} 
| summarize Count=count() by SrcIpAddr | sort by Count
content.title: Top Originators (sources) by # of connections

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "conn"
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange} 
| summarize Count=count() by DstIpAddr | sort by Count
content.title: Top Responders (destinations) by # of connections

items.name: Top Responders (destinations) by # of connections - Copy

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "conn"
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr) and isnotempty(DstIpAddr) and isnotempty(Service) and isnotempty(DstPort) and isnotempty(SrcPort)
| summarize duration=avg(toint(Duration)), make_list(SrcIpAddr), make_list(DstIpAddr), make_list(NetworkProtocol) by EventUid | sort by duration desc | take 50
content.title: Open/Active Long Lived Connections (requires Long Connections Pkg)

items.name: Open/Active Long Lived Connections (requires Long Connections Pkg)

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "dns"
| where isnotempty(DnsQueryTypeName)
| where DstPort =="53" | summarize count() by DnsQueryTypeName
content.title: Top Query Types

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "dns"
| where isnotempty(DnsQueryName)
| summarize Count=count() by DnsQueryName | sort by Count desc | take 10
| join kind = inner (Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "dns"
| where isnotempty(DnsQueryName)
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DnsQueryName)
 on DnsQueryName
content.title: Top 10 Queries by Count

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "dns"
| where DnsResponseCodeName =="NXDOMAIN" and DnsQueryTypeName !="PTR" and DstPort =="53"
| summarize Count=count() by DnsQueryName | sort by Count desc | take 10
| join kind = inner (Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "dns"
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DnsQueryName)
 on DnsQueryName
content.title: Top 10 Queries by Count to Non-Existent Domains

items.name: Top 10 Queries by Count to Non-Existent Domains

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "dns"
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where DstPort == "53" and isnotempty(DnsQueryTypeName)
| summarize Count=count() by SrcIpAddr | sort by Count | take 10
content.title: Top Originators by Count

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "dns"
| where DnsResponseCodeName =="NOERROR" and DnsQueryTypeName =="PTR" and DstPort =="53"
| where DstPort == "53" and isnotempty(DnsQueryTypeName)
| summarize Count=count() by DnsQueryName | sort by Count | take 10
content.title: Top Successful Reverse Queries by Count

items.name: Top Successful Reverse Queries by Count

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "dns"
| where DnsResponseCodeName =="NXDOMAIN" and DnsQueryTypeName == "PTR" and DstPort == "53"
| summarize Count=count() by DnsQueryName | sort by Count | take 10
content.title: Top Reverse Queries by Count to Non-Existent Domains

items.name: Top Reverse Queries by Count to Non-Existent Domains

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "files"
| where isnotempty(MimeType)
| where MimeType != "application/pkix-cert"
| summarize Count=count() by MimeType | sort by Count desc | take 20
content.title: Top 20 Mime Types by File Count

items.name: Top 20 Mime Types by File Count

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "files"
| where isnotempty(MimeType)
| where MimeType != "application/pkix-cert"
| summarize ["File Count"]=count() by Source | sort by ["File Count"] desc | take 15
content.title: Top File Protocols by File Count

items.name: Top File Protocols by File Count

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "files"
| where isnotempty(MimeType)
| where MimeType != "application/pkix-cert"
| extend NetworkDirection = case(LocalOrig == "true", "outbound", LocalOrig == "false", "inbound", "" )
|make-series ["Files Sent"]=countif(NetworkDirection=="outbound"), ["Files Received"]=countif(NetworkDirection=="inbound") on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by EventType | project ["Files Sent"], ["Files Received"], TimeGenerated;
content.title: File Flow - # of Files

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "files"
| where isnotempty(MimeType)
| where MimeType != "application/pkix-cert"
| extend NetworkDirection = case(LocalOrig == "true", "outbound", LocalOrig == "false", "inbound", "" )
|make-series ["Bytes Sent"]=sumif(toint(ZeekFilesSeenBytes), NetworkDirection=="outbound" ), ["Bytes Received"]=sumif(toint(ZeekFilesSeenBytes),NetworkDirection=="inbound") on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by EventType;
content.title: File Flow - Bytes

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "software"
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(SoftwareType)
| summarize Count=count() by Name | sort by Count | take 20
content.title: Top Software

content.query:
Corelight
| where TimeGenerated  {TimeRange}
| where EventType startswith "software"
| where isnotempty(SoftwareType)
| summarize Count=count() by Name, UnparsedVersion | sort by Count
content.title: Top Software Versions

content.query:
Corelight
| where EventType startswith "software"
| where isnotempty(SoftwareType)
| summarize Count=count() by SoftwareType | sort by Count
content.title: Top Software Types
